reviews.review_msg: Dr. Taylor is amazing with fascinating lectures, but get ready for picture-only slides. The course is extremely reading heavy (coming from a 4th year history major), however, it was an incredible course. He makes you learn and the material is so valuable and interesting. I've never worked so hard but it made me a way better student.

Professor Taylor III takes a personal approach to geographical history and I thoroughly enjoyed his autobiography. His stories may at first seem trivial but in fact he has a good thesis and you'll see that Taylor Saves the best for last!
Fantastic Professor. Engaging lectures, forgiving deadlines, clear expectations, and very approachable.

LOVE her. She knows her stuff and makes Canadian history interesting. Don't miss lecture, she always goes over different material than the readings. Course content is super interesting. She is always clear on what she expects, and basically tells you exactly what's going to be tested. Will take again. HIGHLY recommend taking a class with her.
